dct_title_s: Map of Paris : Galeries Lafayette, the department store capital of fashion = Plan de paris : Galeries Lafayette, le grand magasin capitale de la mode
dct_description_sm: Arrondissements are color coded. Selected buildings shown pictorially. On verso: [Paris] plan de métro. On verso: Size comparison chart and information on the store Galeries Lafayette in multiple languages. Indexed for points of interest. "RCS Paris B 542 094 065."
